|                                                   | [Zz](/wiki/Z "Z")                                                                  | [Xx](/wiki/X "X")                                                                  | [Cc](/wiki/C "C")                                                                  | [Vv](/wiki/V "V")                                                                  | [Bb](/wiki/B "B")                                                                  | [Nn](/wiki/N "N")  | [Mm](/wiki/M "M")  | [,](/wiki/, ",")  | [.](/wiki/Dot "Dot") | [/](/wiki/Slash "Slash") | [<](/wiki/Angle_bracket "Angle bracket") | [>](/wiki/Angle_bracket "Angle bracket") |                 [Alt](/wiki/Alt "Alt")                |                                                         |                                   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |   |

- d represents a [canine](/wiki/Canine "Canine"):

  - d [jackal](/wiki/Jackal "Jackal")
  - d [fox](/wiki/Fox "Fox")
  - d [coyote](/wiki/Coyote "Coyote")
  - d [werejackal](/wiki/Werejackal "Werejackal")
  - d [little dog](/wiki/Little_dog "Little dog")
  - d [dog](/wiki/Dog "Dog")
  - d [large dog](/wiki/Large_dog "Large dog")
  - d [dingo](/wiki/Dingo "Dingo")
  - d [wolf](/wiki/Wolf "Wolf")
  - d [werewolf](/wiki/Werewolf "Werewolf")
  - d [warg](/wiki/Warg "Warg")
  - d [winter wolf cub](/wiki/Winter_wolf_cub "Winter wolf cub")
  - d [winter wolf](/wiki/Winter_wolf "Winter wolf")
  - d [hell hound pup](/wiki/Hell_hound_pup "Hell hound pup")
  - d [hell hound](/wiki/Hell_hound "Hell hound")

* D represents a [dragon](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon"):

  - D [baby gray dragon](/wiki/Baby_gray_dragon "Baby gray dragon")

  - D [baby silver dragon](/wiki/Baby_silver_dragon "Baby silver dragon")

  - D [baby red dragon](/wiki/Baby_red_dragon "Baby red dragon")

  - D [baby white dragon](/wiki/Baby_white_dragon "Baby white dragon")

  - D [baby orange dragon](/wiki/Baby_orange_dragon "Baby orange dragon")

  - D [baby black dragon](/wiki/Baby_black_dragon "Baby black dragon")

  - D [baby blue dragon](/wiki/Baby_blue_dragon "Baby blue dragon")

  - D [baby green dragon](/wiki/Baby_green_dragon "Baby green dragon")

  - D [baby yellow dragon](/wiki/Baby_yellow_dragon "Baby yellow dragon")

  - D [gray dragon](/wiki/Gray_dragon "Gray dragon")

  - D [silver dragon](/wiki/Silver_dragon "Silver dragon")

  - D [red dragon](/wiki/Red_dragon "Red dragon")

  - D [white dragon](/wiki/White_dragon "White dragon")

  - D [orange dragon](/wiki/Orange_dragon "Orange dragon")

  - D [black dragon](/wiki/Black_dragon "Black dragon")

  - D [blue dragon](/wiki/Blue_dragon "Blue dragon")

  - D [green dragon](/wiki/Green_dragon "Green dragon")

  - D [yellow dragon](/wiki/Yellow_dragon "Yellow dragon")

  - Two [quest nemeses](/wiki/Quest_nemesis "Quest nemesis") are dragons:

    - D [Chromatic Dragon](/wiki/Chromatic_Dragon "Chromatic Dragon") the [Caveman](/wiki/Caveman "Caveman") nemesis
    - D [Ixoth](/wiki/Ixoth "Ixoth") the [Knight](/wiki/Knight "Knight") nemesis

- Press [d]() to [drop](/wiki/Drop "Drop") an item
- Press [shift](/wiki/Shift "Shift") + [d]() to drop several items
- Press [ctrl](/wiki/Ctrl "Ctrl") + [d]() to [kick](/wiki/Kicking "Kicking") something
- A quantity in [D notation](/wiki/D_notation "D notation"), such as *3d6*, specifies a random number produced by rolling (virtual) dice.

## UnNetHack

[UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack") randomly renames dragons (see [UnNetHack#Dragons](/wiki/UnNetHack#Dragons "UnNetHack")) and adds new ones:

- D [glowing dragon](/wiki/Glowing_dragon "Glowing dragon")
- D [baby glowing dragon](/wiki/Baby_glowing_dragon "Baby glowing dragon")
- D [chromatic dragon (UnNetHack)](/wiki/Chromatic_dragon_\(UnNetHack\) "Chromatic dragon (UnNetHack)")

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") introduces new creatures which use the d and D glyphs:

- d canine:

  - d [pit bull](/wiki/Pit_bull "Pit bull")
  - d [dingo puppy](/wiki/Dingo_puppy "Dingo puppy")
  - d [large dingo](/wiki/Large_dingo "Large dingo")
  - d [death dog](/wiki/Death_dog "Death dog")
  - d [rabid wolf](/wiki/Rabid_wolf "Rabid wolf")
  - d [wolverine](/wiki/Wolverine "Wolverine")
  - d [shadow wolf](/wiki/Shadow_wolf "Shadow wolf")
  - d [mist wolf](/wiki/Mist_wolf "Mist wolf")

- D dragon:

  - D [baby shimmering dragon](/wiki/Baby_shimmering_dragon_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Baby shimmering dragon (SLASH'EM)")
  - D [baby deep dragon](/wiki/Baby_deep_dragon "Baby deep dragon")
  - D [shimmering dragon](/wiki/Shimmering_dragon_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Shimmering dragon (SLASH'EM)")
  - D [deep dragon](/wiki/Deep_dragon "Deep dragon")
  - D [wyvern](/wiki/Wyvern "Wyvern")
  - D [hydra](/wiki/Hydra "Hydra")

D

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
Printable ASCII characters
~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) _ + space
` 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0 - = { } |
Qq Ww Ee Rr Tt Yy Uu Ii Oo Pp : " [ ] \
Aa Ss Dd Ff Gg Hh Jj Kk Ll ? ; ' Ctrl
Zz Xx Cc Vv Bb Nn Mm , . / < > Alt
  • d represents a canine:
    • d jackal
    • d fox
    • d coyote
    • d werejackal
    • d little dog
    • d dog
    • d large dog
    • d dingo
    • d wolf
    • d werewolf
    • d warg
    • d winter wolf cub
    • d winter wolf
    • d hell hound pup
    • d hell hound
  • D represents a dragon:
    • D baby gray dragon
    • D baby silver dragon
    • D baby red dragon
    • D baby white dragon
    • D baby orange dragon
    • D baby black dragon
    • D baby blue dragon
    • D baby green dragon
    • D baby yellow dragon
    • D gray dragon
    • D silver dragon
    • D red dragon
    • D white dragon
    • D orange dragon
    • D black dragon
    • D blue dragon
    • D green dragon
    • D yellow dragon
    • Two quest nemeses are dragons:
      • D Chromatic Dragon the Caveman nemesis
      • D Ixoth the Knight nemesis
  • Press d to drop an item
  • Press shift + d to drop several items
  • Press ctrl + d to kick something
  • A quantity in D notation, such as 3d6, specifies a random number produced by rolling (virtual) dice.

UnNetHack

UnNetHack randomly renames dragons (see UnNetHack#Dragons) and adds new ones:

  • D glowing dragon
  • D baby glowing dragon
  • D chromatic dragon (UnNetHack)

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM introduces new creatures which use the d and D glyphs:

  • d canine:
    • d pit bull
    • d dingo puppy
    • d large dingo
    • d death dog
    • d rabid wolf
    • d wolverine
    • d shadow wolf
    • d mist wolf
  • D dragon:
    • D baby shimmering dragon
    • D baby deep dragon
    • D shimmering dragon
    • D deep dragon
    • D wyvern
    • D hydra
